directions: [["In the bowl of a standing mixer (or in a large bowl with if you are using a pastry cutter), mix flour and salt together."],["With your pastry cutter or with the mixer on low, work in the cream cheese and butter, a little at a time, until the dough resembles coarse crumbles."],["Turn out the dough onto a lightly floured surface (the dough will be crumbly)."],["Add cold water to the dough, and work the dough until it begins to form a ball. If the dough is too crumbly, and is not sticking together, add in another Tbsp(s) of water until the dough forms a ball."],["Cover the dough in plastic wrap and chill for 30 minutes."],["On a floured surface, roll dough into a large circle, about 1/8\" thick. Transfer and press dough into a pie plate."],["Add pie filling and bake."],[""],[""],[""]]
ingredients: [{"number":["3/2"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["All purpose flour"],"category":[""]},{"number":["1/2"],"units":["Teaspoon(s)"],"name":["Salt"],"category":[""]},{"number":["4"],"units":["Ounce(s)"],"name":["Cream cheese, cold and cubed"],"category":[""]},{"number":["1/2"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["Butter, cold and cubed"],"category":[""]},{"number":["1"],"units":["Tablespoon(s)"],"name":["Cold water"],"category":[""]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""],"category":[""]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""],"category":[""]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""],"category":[""]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""],"category":[""]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""],"category":[""]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""],"category":[""]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""],"category":[""]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""],"category":[""]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""],"category":[""]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""],"category":[""]}]
